Package blue.lapis.common.economy.event

Interface Summary
AccountCreatedEvent Called when a new EconomyAccount is created by an economy plugin.
AccountDeletedEvent Called when an EconomyAccount is deleted.
EconomyEvent Base interface for events related to economy.
TransactionEvent Signals that a Transaction is about to complete, and offers a chance to change its details before it is applied.
